results.title: Pharmacological activation of SIRT1 by metformin prevented trauma-induced heterotopic ossification through inhibiting macrophage mediated inflammation.
results.text_hl: Taken together, our results provide a novel evidence that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can effectively attenuate @DISEASE_Wounds_and_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D014947 @@@trauma@@@-induced @DISEASE_Ossification_Heterotopic @DISEASE_MESH:D009999 @@@HO@@@ by mitigating macrophage @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ responses through inhibiting @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_18033 @@@NF-kappaB@@@ signaling via @GENE_SIRT1 @GENE_93759 @@@SIRT1@@@-dependent mechanisms, which favors future therapeutic investigations for @<m>DISEASE_Trauma_and_Stressor_Related_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000068099 @@@trauma-related disease@@@.
